name: The Light in the Dark (T3kMast3r)
description:
Essentially geometry dash but you can change the environment from light to dark and vice versa to avoid the spikes and other obstructions.

CAUTION - Game does not work as intended yet

Controls:

  • Space - Jump
  • E - Change Environment

Evan Kessman

2D Pixel Art Medieval Backgrounds Pack - Mokawyler
